Class Coordinates

java.lang.Object
com.ft.pckg.utils.Coordinates
public final class Coordinates extends Object
Represents a Value Object to 3D position of an aircraft.

Coordinates are always positive and height is restricted to the range 0-100.

  • Field Summary

    • Coordinates

      public Coordinates(int p_longitude, int p_latitude, int p_height)
      Creates a new Coordinates instance.
      Parameters:
      p_longitude - initial longitude (positive)
      p_latitude - initial latitude (positive)
      p_height - initial height (0-100)
